# GitHub Actions Prompts

CI/CD workflow best practices for GitHub Actions.

## Prompt Library

| File | Description | Use When |
|------|-------------|----------|
| [workflows.md](workflows.md) | Workflow structure and patterns | Creating CI/CD pipelines |
| [security.md](security.md) | Security best practices | Hardening workflows |
| [optimization.md](optimization.md) | Performance optimization | Speeding up builds |

## Usage

```markdown
{{include:vendors/github-actions/workflows.md}}
```

## Skills

- `github-actions:audit` - Audit workflow security and performance
- `github-actions:optimize` - Suggest workflow optimizations
